results.content: It definately is an 'Advanced' Woocommerce course. Tho i would have loved a bit more in-depth content about the possabilities and the why behind code that has been typed. Overal this course is nice when you have no experience about the basics of the Woocommerce documentation in the backend and how to use it as child theme.

response.content: Thank you for your review Mark. I'm glad you enjoyed the course. Look forward to seeing you again. Thanks, Walt Dombrowski
response.content_html: Thank you for your review Mark. I'm glad you enjoyed the course. Look forward to seeing you again. Thanks, Walt Dombrowski

results.content:
The course is definitely worth the $9.99 I paid for it. I have coded before, but not at the level that Wordpress/Woocommerce is written, so it helped give me confidence finding and reading the code to then make changes. 

While not very dynamic, the instructor did well in explaining the code snippets that were used. While the depth of the explanations was certainly good, he could have gone into a little more depth possibly. 

As I said previously, the video was terrible at times. Primarily, there are several points where the text on the screen is unreadable. Most of the time it was acceptable, but for those short periods. UGH!

response.content:
Hi Steve,
Im sorry to hear that you had problems with the video.  Can you tell me which ones so I can fix them please.

Thanks,
Walt Dombrowski

results.content_html:
The course is definitely worth the $9.99 I paid for it. I have coded before, but not at the level that Wordpress/Woocommerce is written, so it helped give me confidence finding and reading the code to then make changes.

While not very dynamic, the instructor did well in explaining the code snippets that were used. While the depth of the explanations was certainly good, he could have gone into a little more depth possibly.

As I said previously, the video was terrible at times. Primarily, there are several points where the text on the screen is unreadable. Most of the time it was acceptable, but for those short periods. UGH!

results.content: This course has very useful information for designers/developers who want to really customize the shopping experience.
results.content_html: This course has very useful information for designers/developers who want to really customize the shopping experience.

results.content:
Not sure I would class this as an advanced course, most things covered are quite self explanatory if you understand the file structure of Woocommerce and have a basic understanding of php.  Beginners to Woocomerce would find this course helpful, but if you have used the product for a while like me it doesn't tell you anything you probably don't already know.

As mentioned by others some of the video's are quite blurry to start with, breadcrumb function part 3 is_single() - first minute is particularly bad.
results.content_html:
Not sure I would class this as an advanced course, most things covered are quite self explanatory if you understand the file structure of Woocommerce and have a basic understanding of php. Beginners to Woocomerce would find this course helpful, but if you have used the product for a while like me it doesn't tell you anything you probably don't already know.

As mentioned by others some of the video's are quite blurry to start with, breadcrumb function part 3 is_single() - first minute is particularly bad.
